item.title: US Mulls $500M Cobalt Purchase For Defense Stockpiles: Vale, Sumitomo, Glencore Unit In Pentagon’s Sight
item.description: The U.S. is looking for offers for alloy-grade cobalt of about 7,480 tonnes over the next five years.

item.title: Meta Inks Six-Year, $10B Cloud Deal With Google To Bolster AI Infrastructure
item.description: The agreement marks the first time Meta will use Google Cloud for computing services.
